thread.title: Broward takes first steps toward 'Downtown West'
thread.title_full: Broward takes first steps toward 'Downtown West'

author: Brittany Wallman
title: Broward takes first steps toward 'Downtown West'
text:
Broward takes first steps toward 'Downtown West' Tribune 
Broward County is considering developing land around its BB&T Center hockey arena in Sunrise 
Broward County is considering developing land around its BB&T Center hockey arena in Sunrise (Tribune) 
It's like nothing that has ever been built in South Florida. 
Known as Metropica, the "city within a city" would have: 
•More than 2,000 condos 
•Enough commercial space to hold 11 Wal-Marts. 
The massive, $1.5 billion project — nearly double the size of the neighboring Sawgrass Mills ... (Susannah Bryan, Sun Sentinel)
